curricula.title: Our Integrated Educational Curricula
curricula.desc: The Arab International School in Jakarta is a distinguished international school that combines excellent academic education with authentic Islamic values.

0.title: Light of the Quran
0.desc: Teaching reading and the Quran in a phonetic and gradual manner.

1.title: Montessori Curriculum
1.desc: self-directed learning, independence, and sensory skills.

2.title: Cambridge EYFS
2.desc: To strengthen language skills, science, and early thinking.

3.title: ICO
3.desc: Teach Arabic language and Islamic values in a simplified manner.

arabic.desc: Teaching Arabic language, religion, and Quran recitation with mastery.

english.desc: For sciences, mathematics, and global communication with fluency and confidence.

indonesian.desc: Learning national curricula, arts, and local culture.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To be a leading model in international Arab Islamic education providing a high-quality educational experience that nurtures the child's mind, refines their behavior and enhances their self-confidence.

respect.title: Respect
respect.desc: We instill with respect and respect for others, and promote an inclusive environment that values everyone.

collaboration.title: Collaboration

q1.question: How does the school care for teaching Islamic values?
q1.answer: We emphasize Islamic values throughout our educational process. Our curriculum includes the international ICO program for Islamic and general studies, along with Quran memorization classes for all ages. We also incorporate ethics and Islamic manners into daily lessons, guided by teachers who exemplify these values through practical examples.

q2.question: What is the number of students in each class or three languages environment?
q2.answer: Class sizes vary by level to ensure quality education and individual attention for each student.

q3.question: Are there extracurricular activities in school?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer various extracurricular activities including sports, arts, cultural programs, and Quranic studies to support holistic student development.

q4.question: How can I enroll my child? What are the required steps?
q4.answer: Enrollment is easy! Contact us through phone, WhatsApp, or email to schedule a school visit and learn about our admission requirements.

q5.question: Does the child need to be proficient in one of the three languages environment?
q5.answer: No prior language proficiency is required. Our trilingual program is designed to help students develop skills in Arabic, English, and Indonesian progressively.

location.title: Our Location, Their Second Home
location.subtitle: In a calm and secure location, we offer your children a learning space that's close to you — and close to their hearts.

register.title: Registration At The International Arab School – 2025/2026
register.welcomeText: We warmly welcome you in advance to our school family and thank you for your trust in choosing us.
register.instructionText: After selecting the appropriate school and educational stage for your child, you can proceed to the pre-registration page by clicking the designated button.
register.processText: Please follow the steps outlined after clicking the "Register" button, and read the instructions carefully until the process is complete. If you have any questions or encounter any difficulties during the registration process, the school's support team will be fully prepared to assist you at every stage.
register.wishText: We are delighted to have you join us and wish our children a school year filled with success and progress.
register.schoolSelection: Choose your child's school for next year.
register.classSelection: Please select your child's next class.

familyInformation.motherNamePlaceholder: Enter the full name of the mother
familyInformation.nationalIdPlaceholder: Enter the national ID or passport number
familyInformation.guardianRelationship: Relationship of the guardian to the student
familyInformation.guardianRelationshipPlaceholder: Specify the guardian's relationship to the student
familyInformation.parentAgePlaceholder: Enter the age of the parent/guardian
familyInformation.workPlacePlaceholder: Enter the name of the place of work

educationHealth.title: Student Education and Health Journey
educationHealth.subtitle: Share the student's academic history and any important health information that may support their learning and well-being.

attachments.notes: Please read these notes before completing the registration.
attachments.note1: Students and guardians must wear Islamic attire when attending school.
attachments.note2: Registration fees are non-refundable in case of withdrawal.

thankYou.title: Thank you for enrolling your son with the International Arab School.
thankYou.message: We have received your application and will review it shortly. We will contact you to arrange a personal interview to complete the registration process.
